We are taking applications and registering students for summer. Tutorium services have moved online, and we are all here to help and support you.  Click to schedule an online appointment with our Admissions Team:   Fran Michalski, Associate Director  Ellie Stathopoulos, Program Assistant   Click the link below for answers to questions about the Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic and discover ways to keep a positive attitude while staying inside.    View COVID-19 Updates           Study English on the UIC Campus      Your Path to Academic Success  For more than 40 years, our highly qualified and experienced staff and instructors have helped students of all levels, from all backgrounds, learn English to achieve their academic, professional and personal goals.  As part of the University of Illinois at Chicago, the Tutorium can help you progress from full-time study in our Intensive English Program to an undergraduate or graduate degree at University of Illinois at Chicago.  The Tutorium provides:   Expert, experienced instructors in a supportive environment  A diverse community of international students on a vibrant campus  Paths to progress to an undergraduate or graduate degree at UIC         Tutorium Programs           Intensive English Program  Our Intensive English Program prepares students for academic and professional success.             Paths to University Study  Learn how the Tutorium can help you get into UIC undergraduate and graduate programs.             English for International Professionals  Evening, weekend and online part-time English courses             Test Preparation  Learn test taking skills that will help you increase your score on the TOEFL or IELTS.             Other Programs  Discover our vacation English course and other options for customized programs.             Tutoring & Editing Services  Meet with instructors for one-on-one private instruction and editing services.             The Tutorium is located on the University of Illinois at Chicago campus        # 1   The Tutorium is proud to be a part of the University of Illinois at Chicago, the number one public research university in Illinois.         # 3   Chicago is the third largest city in the country. The city offers a wide variety of attractions and events that can enhance your stay in the USA.         # 11   Chicago's population is one of the most diverse. It currently ranks as the 11th most diverse city in the country. No matter where you're from, you'll be able to find someone with a similar background.             Hear From Our Students        “I loved UIC TIE program! The teachers were great. I did just one medium-intermidiate level session in the Spring, which was enough for me to start taking undergraduate classes at a community college in the Fall of the same year. I learned so much in a very short time. Excellent English program as I am now a nurse and in grad school :). I am very proud to say that I went to one of the best ESL classes in Chicago. I would definitely recommend it”    Jaqueline Silva | Brazil | Nurse          “The best place in Chicago for international students from all around the World to come to learn English. Everyone here is just simply amazing. I love this place.”    Anh Dang | Vietnam
